I now universally bow to all the Buddhas of the ten directions, three periods of time.
I now universally bow to all the Buddhas of the ten directions, three periods of time, up to a thousand times.
Then I will rise.
The merits obtained are as explained above.
Next, there are fifty-three Buddhas, appearing in the Sutra of the Medicine King and Superior Medicine.

All the World-Honored Buddhas in these worlds,
always abide in the world.
These World-Honored Ones should have loving thoughts of me.
If in this life,
or in previous lives,
I have committed various offenses from beginningless cyclic existence,
whether I have done them myself, seen others do them, or rejoiced in them,
whether I have taken the property of the stÅ«pa, the Saá¹ƒgha, or the Saá¹ƒgha of the four directions,
whether I have taken it myself, had others take it, or rejoiced in it,
or whether I have committed the grave offenses of the five heinous crimes with immediate retribution,
whether I have done them myself, had others do them, or rejoiced in them,
or whether I have done the ten unwholesome courses of action myself, had others do them, or rejoiced in them,
the offenses and hindrances I have created,ğŸ”½some of which I have concealed,
and some of which I have not concealed,
I should have fallen into the hells, hungry ghosts, animals, and other evil destinies, the borderlands, low castes, and the barbarian regions.
Such evil karmic hindrances that I have created,
I now repent of them all.
Now the World-Honored Buddhas should bear witness to me,
should remember me.
And in the presence of the World-Honored Buddhas,
I make this statement:
If in this life or in other lives,
I have ever practiced giving,
or guarded pure precepts,
up to giving a single morsel of food to an animal,
or cultivated pure conduct,
all the wholesome roots accomplished by sentient beings,
all the wholesome roots cultivated for enlightenment,
all the wholesome roots and unsurpassed wisdom,
all the wholesome roots gathered and calculated together,
I dedicate them all to supreme, perfect enlightenment.
Just as the Buddhas of the past, future, and present make dedications,
I also dedicate in the same way.
